title: Erosion of Communism in Eastern Europe

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the long-term and short-term factors responsible for the disintegration of communist rule in TWO of the following states: Czechoslovakia East Germany Hungary Poland

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the long-term and short-term factors responsible for the disintegration of communist rule in TWO of the following states: Czechoslovakia East Germany Hungary Poland

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
